item.title: teaching
item.description: Hello! In the winter term of 2021 (October-February), I’m teaching a Statistics course for MA students in Linguistics at Universit√§t Konstanz. The course is taugh fully online. You can find all of the video lecture material on Vimeo here. You can access lecture slides, source code and practice material from my github repo at mcanzi/statistics-course If you are interested in further tutorial and exercise material (or extra resources), please do not hesitate to get in touch with me via e-mail
